item.title: Mysql Findinset Multiplevalues
item.description: 1 2 3 4 5 6 /* Something likes find_in_set('a,b,c', 'a,b,c,d') We can use OR: find_in_set('a', 'a,b,c,d') OR find_in_set('b', 'a,b,c,d') OR find_in_set('b', 'a,b,c,d') */WHERECONCAT(",",`setcolumn`,",")REGEXP",(val1|val2|val3),"
